pkgmetadata.longdescription: Machine Learning Algorithms for Multivariate Time Series // An implementation of several machine learning algorithms for multivariate time series. The package includes functions allowing the execution of clustering, classification or outlier detection methods, among others. It also incorporates a collection of multivariate time series datasets which can be used to analyse the performance of new proposed algorithms. Practitioners from a broad variety of fields could benefit from the general framework provided by 'mlmts'.
